row.process: :set &uc_register_ofile = sys_last_registered_ofile :set &uc_register_ulogin = sys_last_registered_ulogin :set &uc_register_otype# = sys_act_me_type() :if &uc_register_otype# = 'JOBS' if [ -f "&uc_register_ofile" ]; then &UC_JOBMD MNR=&UC_MANDANT IPA=&UC_IP_ADDR JNR=&UC_REALNR PNR=&UC_IP_PORT TYP=O ULOGIN=&uc_register_ulogin OUTFILE="&uc_register_ofile" TRC=&UC_JOB_MD_TRC fi : INC JOBI.RETENTION_DAYS, NOFOUND=IGNORE :endif
